meanings.definition: A chemical group containing a nitrogen atom double-bonded to an oxygen atom.
meanings.sent1: The imido in the molecule gives it unique properties.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of imido in various compounds.
meanings.sent3: The imido group decided to bond with the oxygen atom for a change.
meanings.sent4: The imido seemed to dance with the oxygen atom in the chemical reaction.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the imido structure looked like a tiny bridge between nitrogen and oxygen.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a compound containing the imido group.
meanings.sent1: The imido compound showed interesting characteristics under testing.
meanings.sent2: Chemists identified the imido properties in the new substance.
meanings.sent3: The imido reaction was so quick, it surprised everyone in the lab.
meanings.sent4: Her dress shimmered like an imido gem under the lights.
meanings.sent5: The imido nature of the material made it stand out among other compounds.
